Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class that represents the player
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Player(java.lang.String name)
